column1: Kata Robata////We ordered quite a few dishes from the happy hour menu to share. My personal favorites were the Spicy Salmon Roll
column4: and this chicken dish that included kimchi powder and grits (forgot the name). The dishes were fresh
column6: and pretty filling. For my drink
column7: I ordered a glass of red wine off the happy hour menu
column8: and while it wasn't too bad
column9: it wasn't my favorite. They also didn't specify on the menu what kind of red it was.
